product_name: The North Face Sitella Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Break out The North Face Sitella dress for neighborhood picnics, barbecues on hot days or anytime you want the comfort of breathable cotton in a simple but cute sundress. The comfortable smocked back and Empire waist make this stretch cotton jersey dress a cinch to slip on. Shirred detailing at banded hem adds movement to the The North Face Sitella dress. Closeout.
short_description: Break out The North Face Sitella dress for neighborhood picnics, barbecues on hot days or anytime you want the comfort of breathable cotton in a simple but cute sundress.
